title: Data Structures
subtitle: Explore and understand the fundamentals of data structures - the building blocks that organize and store data in computer memory. Learn how different structures optimize for different operations and use cases.

overview.heading: Understanding Data Structures
overview.description: The foundation of efficient algorithms and programming
why_points: They determine the way data is organized in memory
They impact algorithm efficiency and performance
Different structures optimize for different operations (insertion, deletion, search)
The right structure can dramatically improve application performance

linear.title: Linear Data Structures
linear.description: Elements arranged sequentially, with each element having at most two neighbors.

nonlinear.title: Non-Linear Data Structures
nonlinear.description: Elements arranged hierarchically or in a network, with elements having multiple connections.

learning_path.title: Learning Path
learning_path.description: Follow this path to master data structures

steps.title: Start with Overview
steps.description: Understand the basics of data structures

steps.title: Explore Linear Structures
steps.description: Arrays, lists, stacks, queues, and more

comparison.title: Choosing the Right Data Structure
comparison.description: Compare common operations across different data structures

rows.use_when: You need fast access by index
You need fast lookup by key
You need to represent complex relationships
